amendment.description: Amendment increases funding, by offset, for analysis operations under the Department of Homeland Security's intelligence function by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce appropriation for the Office of the Secretary of Homeland Security by $1,000,000 and reduce appropriation for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $11,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 205 (Roll no. 455).
